title: Rhinoceros-Horn Cup
description: [MOCK DATA - description invented for prototype] Rhinoceros horn cups were prized luxury objects. Cabinet lists this item with links to the Ashmolean Museum Tradescant collection.

images.caption: Cup in Shape of Rhinoceros Horn, Qing dynasty (1644-1911), China, 18th century
